AddTask - Class in multithreading
Class implementing runnable which executes the task of adding a product in the products array of the auction house
AddTask(Product) - Constructor for class multithreading.AddTask
Constructor that sets the product to be added
Administrator - Class in organisers
The Administrator is the one that has the ability to create threads for adding products, and to add any type of object to the auction house.
Antique - Class in products
An Antique type of product
Antique(int, String) - Constructor for class products.Antique

applyCommission() - Method in class organisers.Broker
Applies a commission for every observer
applyCommission(Observer) - Method in class organisers.Broker
Applies a commission for a specific observer
Auction - Class in organisers
The class for storing all the relevant information about an auction, like how many participants are needed for the auction to start, or the maximum steps of bidding that are executed
Auction() - Constructor for class organisers.Auction
Constructor that initialises the number of signed up participants to 0
Auction(int, int, int) - Constructor for class organisers.Auction
Constructor that initialises the product id, the number of maximum steps and the number of participants
AuctionHouse - Class in organisers
The AuctionHouse class is based on the Singleton Design Pattern and holds all the fields necessary for the auctions
